AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.about: I'm a passionate and versatile software developer with a keen eye for detail and a relentless drive to create elegant, user-centric solutions. My expertise spans the full stack, from crafting visually stunning interfaces to architecting robust backend systems.

Hero.title: I'm a Sofware Developer
Hero.bio: I specialize in building modern, responsive web applications using the latest technologies. With over 4 years of experience, I have honed my skills in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more.
